main: ^Greetings, traveler! What brings you to our humble village?
^Do you have any goods to trade?

c-0: ^Take a look and tell me if anything catches your eye. I wouldn't blame you if it did.
c-1: ^ can see the fury in your eyes.
^"Let's see if you can also wield the weapons you craft" Attack
^You pretend as if your stare was meant as a joke
^ is flustered. Then, anxiously giggles and tries to relax.

c-2: ^I am the village blacksmith. I forge weapons and armor for our brave warriors. If you're in need of any equipment, I can offer you my services.
^ if there are any tasks that need your help

c-0: ^Ah, I have a task that requires a skilled adventurer like yourself. A pack of wolves has been attacking our livestock. If you can eliminate the threat, you'll be rewarded handsomely.
^I was hoping you'd say that. Be careful.
c-1: ^A pity... I would've parted with some special trinkets for your good deed.
